preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('Citrobacter Koseri (diversus)','Enterobacter amnigenus','Esherichia hermanii', 'Klebsiella Oxytoca','Moraxella sp.','Serratia liquefaciens','Serratia odorifera', 'Staphylococcus capitis ss. Capitis', 'Staphylococcus cohnii ss. Cohnii','Staphylococcus haemolyticus', 'Staphylococcus hominis ss. Hominis','Stenotrophmonas maltophilia', 'Proteus vulgaris', 'Pseudomonas putida') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Microbiology, Final Identification");

changeSet.comment: Adding answers for Microbiology, Final Identification
